trans-unit.source: write comma-separated list. choose from: month, agendaWeek, basicWeek, agendaDay, basicDay, listYear, listMonth, listWeek, listDay
write commaseparated additional fullcalendar Config which are not provided by plugin. See full list of options at fullcalendar.io. Example: columnFormat: "ddd D.M.",weekends:false
Determines the width-to-height aspect ratio of the calendar. Default: 1.35
Determines which content to use for ICS Invite Description. ICS does not show proper HTML, so choose a option which does not contain HTML
Custom Field of the news Item. It should exist and NOT contain html.
